clientOutdated: The client app isn't up to date. Please tell your client to install the latest update.
scannerOutdated: The scanner app isn't up to date. Please open the store and install the latest update in order to scan this code.
invalidFormat: The scanned data isn't formatted correctly
dataIncompleteInvalid: The scanned data is incomplete or invalid. An update on the client side might be required.
askingPermissions: Asking for access to the camera
noPermissions: No permissions to access the camera. You can change this in the privacy settings
noMatchingCheckIn: Check-out failed. No matching Check-in was found.
showLinkToCustomers: Show this link to your customers. It links to the website and app.
